input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='Nearly Natural Wisconsin Slim Snow Tip Pine Artificial Christmas Tree with 150 Clear LED Lights'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill European Fir Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 5 ft. Slim Flocked Montreal Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 150 Warm White LED Lights & 491 Bendable Branches'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Stratford Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6 ft. Flocked Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 500 Warm White Lights & 236 Bendable Branches'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Greenwich Estates Pine Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Flip Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Balsam Fir Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Red Spruce Slim Flip Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman 6.5' x 50" Douglas Fir Artificial Unlit Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 6.5-ft. Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with PowerConnect Clear Lights'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural Wisconsin Slim Snow Tip Pine Artificial Christmas Tree with 150 Clear LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand and pine species; slim shape differs from downswept full Douglas Fir; fewer lights and possibly different branch construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand and tree species (White Spruce vs Douglas Fir); likely similar purpose but probably different branch construction and silhouette.
Different brand but same general fir species; specific model may differ in silhouette and lighting features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 5 ft. Slim Flocked Montreal Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 150 Warm White LED Lights & 491 Bendable Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir type and pre-lit feature with many bendable branches; shorter height and slim shape lower relevancy slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Stratford Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (Spruce) and brand; no indication of downswept silhouette; moderate relevancy for general tree category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand but same fir species; narrow silhouette reduces similarity but pre-lit and construction may be comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6 ft. Flocked Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 500 Warm White Lights & 236 Bendable Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar species and number of lights; flocked and bendable branches suggest good construction similarity; slightly shorter height.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Greenwich Estates Pine Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (Pine) and brand; claims of realism but different silhouette and branch style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same fir species and brand; flip branches differ from hinged but still similar in purpose; likely pre-lit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Balsam Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different fir species (Balsam Fir) from Douglas Fir; different brand; moderate similarity in intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species and narrow silhouette; lower relevance despite similar function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Red Spruce Slim Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different spruce species, slim silhouette, flip branch style; less similar to downswept Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 6.5' x 50" Douglas Fir Artificial Unlit Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same species and size as reference; not pre-lit reduces score slightly; similar construction likely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6.5-ft. Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, fir species, and downswept style; pencil slim shape differs from full-bodied in reference but pre-lit and height match well.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with PowerConnect Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, model type, downswept Douglas Fir, pre-lit with advanced PowerConnect lights; very close or identical product with slight height difference.
